definition: Peony Card (credit card issued by Industrial and Commercial Bank of China)
(of a bird, animal or plant) male/key/hills
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: You'll get your card in a week after receiving the required documents from you.
sentences.chinese: 在收到规定证件后，一周之内您可以拿到牡丹卡。

sentences.english: Doe it do anything with the Peony Card?
sentences.chinese: 这与牡丹卡有什么关系吗？

sentences.english: I want to have a Peony Card from your bank, but I don't know what kind of card is best for me.
sentences.chinese: 我想在贵行办一张牡丹卡，但我不知道哪一种卡方便。

sentences.english: What benefits do the Peony Card have for corporate cardholder?
sentences.chinese: 领用牡丹卡对单位有什么利益呢？

sentences.english: Get a Peony Card as soon.
Give me your ticket and Mudan card.
sentences.chinese: 把您的罚单和牡丹卡给我。

definition: online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
ICBC (Industrial and Commercial Bank of China)/abbr. for 工商銀行|工商银行[Gong1 Shang1 Yin2 hang2]
to report the loss of something
to replace a lost or damaged SIM card, retaining one's original telephone number/SIM replacement

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Pu3 dong1 Fa1 zhan3 Yin2 hang2
